JOB DESCRIPTION: In this role, you will :      Partner with teams to build understanding of E2E System & related pain points.    Have the ability to break complex problems into simpler solutions.    Quickly research & build proof of concepts to evaluate & suggest alternative approaches.    Architect, design, code, test, deploy & monitor changes to E2E system harness.    Build tools, utilities to solve operational pain points & expand capabilities of E2E system harness.    Own & improve stability and reliability of test environments, thereby facilitating faster and error free production deployments.      Requirements   :     BS or MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience    Architectural design skills    Analytical and problem solving skills    Object-oriented programming (Java) and design skills.    Experience with performance checks and scaling.    Experience with Containers, Pipelines, Jenkins and CI/CD.      Preferred experience and skills:      Experience of developing test automations.    Knowledge in test methodologies, Integration test, Writing test plans, creating unit test cases, and debugging.    SQL/Database    RESTful web services    Site performance & reliability tooling (NewRelic, ELK)
